Articles.Content:
I would greatly appreciate it if someone would make a cargo bay for the mk1 fuselage 1.25m. In 2m, 5m length or both. I would love this for small space planes to deliver small payloads to orbit. I had a cargo bay from d12 expansion of b9 but the mesh is only on the bottom half of the cargo bay so i fall through when walking on it and it does NOT shield parts in FAR. I was most disappointed. Please someone out there. I dont even care if it's textured as long as its functional. THANK YOU.

PS. If it already exists please link me i have been unable to locate one as of yet.
Just tell FAR that the d12 part ( or any part ) is a cargo bay and the shielding will work - obviously that won't help with there being no door colliders.
Can I revive this thread by asking again? Are there some smaller mods than MKS that have 1.25m cargo bays?

You can rescale this to fit Cargo Transportation [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77505-Cargo-Transportation-Solutions-%28WIP%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77505-Cargo-Transportation-Solutions-%28WIP%29)
Vens part revamp has a 1.25 cargo bay

[Modular Rocket Systems](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93067-1-0-2-Modular-Rocket-Systems-v1-6-2-%282015-05-01%29-Stock-alike-Parts-Pack) has a 1.25 cargo bay but is a has a lot of other parts so y recommend you to download the lite version
Thanks for all the answers, guys! God, I love this community! :-)
